plan.text: Set up Sentry webhook to trigger on new issues
Extract stacktrace and relevant information from Sentry issue
Use AI to summarize the stacktrace
Determine issue severity based on AI summary
Label issue in Sentry with determined severity
If severity is high, create a Jira ticket with issue details
Link Jira ticket back to Sentry issue if created

questions.label: Which AI model would you like to use for summarizing the stacktrace?
What severity levels would you like to use?
What should be considered 'high' severity for creating Jira tickets?

discoveries.title: Determine optimal length for AI-generated summaries
Define specific criteria for each severity level

pipelines.title: Process new Sentry issue
steps: Create Jira ticket if high severity
